#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

vector <int> v[100005];
int in[100005];
int q[100005];

int main()
{
    int n, m, k, x, y;
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin >> n >> m >> k;


    for(int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        cin >> x >> y;
        v[x].push_back(y);
        v[y].push_back(x);
        in[x]++;
        in[y]++;
    }

    int l, r;
    l = r = 0;

    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if(in[i] < k)
        q[r++] = i, in[i] = 0;
    }

    while(l != r) {
        int pos = q[l];
        l++;
        for(int i = 0; i < v[pos].size(); i++) {
            if(in[v[pos][i]] == k) {
                in[v[pos][i]] = 0;
                q[r++] = v[pos][i];
            }
            else {
                in[v[pos][i]]--;
            }
        }
    }

    cout << n-r << endl;

}
